body: I don't know about any of you guys, but Jeanne Dack is definitely the best artist of all time. His stories  go over a multitude of genres and handle the in outlandish or even strange ways. This is probably the closest if not only thing we have to metahentai. The art-style may not be crisp and amazing but the characters do have a potent curvacious sex appeal.

THIS ARTIST IS A FUCKING HAZARD TO SOCIETY
HOW THE FUCK IS AN INDIVIDUAL ABLE OF DRAWING SOMETHING SO HORRENDOUS?
@JOJO666, I may be a troll, but I know my geography. Google is your friend, pal.
@Reverie00, I applaud you for having made a "creative" message...also there is no tundra in Antarctica, only ice caps...and mountains.
Why hasn't this retard been banished to the furthest corners of the Antarctic tundra yet?
I don't give a fuck what anyone says about this mans artstyle I never fail to laugh at the dumbass stories he creates.
